titles.title: Fairness and Opportunities for Married Households With Student Loans Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount allowed as a deduction for interest on education loans paid by married couples.
Fairness and Opportunities for Married Households With Student Loans Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Fairness and Opportunities for Married Households With Student Loans Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $5,000 the tax deduction for interest on education loans for married couples filing a joint tax return.
